20030000.English_Text: (She has a worried look on his face.)

20030002.Original_Text: 혹시 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 보셨나요?\n우리 집 개가 혼자 외출하고 안 돌아왔어요.
20030002.English_Text:
Have you seen our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>?
Our dog hasn't come back from his walk.
20030002.Chinese_Text:
有没有看到我家的小希望？
我家的狗出门之后还没有回来。

20030003.Chinese_Text: （问小狗的名字是否叫小希望）

20030004.Original_Text: 강아지 아니에요. 개에요. 개. 다 컸어요.\n집도 알고 말도 다 알아들어요.
20030004.English_Text:
He's a fully grown dog, not a puppy.
He knows how to get back home and understands what we say.
20030004.Chinese_Text:
不是小狗，是狗。已经长大了。
不仅记得家的位置，也能听懂人话。

20030005.Original_Text: 얼굴도 다 알아보고 똑똑해요.\n손! 이러면 손도 내밀고. 앉아 일어서도 잘하고요.
20030005.English_Text:
He's smart enough to recognize people.
And he'll give you his paw if you ask him to shake! And he's good at sitting and standing up.
20030005.Chinese_Text:
小希望还能认出人脸，很聪明。
说手！就会伸出爪子，也会听命令坐下或起来。

20030006.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> must be a very smart dog.

20030007.Original_Text: 근데 집에 안 들어왔어요. 몰라서 못 오는 건 아닐 거예요.\n영리해서 백 리밖에서도 집을 찾을 수 있을 거예요.
20030007.English_Text:
But he hasn't come back yet, and it's not because he's lost.
He's smart enough to find the way back home, even from the furthest reaches of the world.
20030007.Chinese_Text:
可是它还没有回家。它不回家的原因不可能是不认路。
它很聪明，即使在百里之外也能回到家。

20030008.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>를 찾아 주세요. 어제부터 밥도 못 먹었을 텐데...
20030008.English_Text: Please find <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>. He must be starving since yesterday...
20030008.Chinese_Text: 请帮我找到小希望。它应该从昨天就没吃饭了...

20030009.Original_Text: 근처에 가면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</> 소리가 들릴 거에요.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</>에 이름이 쓰여 있으니까 금방 알 수 있을 거예요.
20030009.English_Text:
You'll be able to hear the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</> he's wearing when you're close to him.
You can be sure it's him by checking the name on his <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</>.
20030009.Chinese_Text:
在它附近能听到铃铛声。
铃铛上写着名字，很容易辨认。

20030010.English_Text: I'll let you know if I find him.
20030010.Chinese_Text: （说如果找到的话一定会告诉她）

20030011.English_Text: Do you happen to know <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> the dog?

20030012.Original_Text: 개? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 알지. 아주 착하고 점잖은 개야.\n그리고 아주 몸집이 크지.
20030012.English_Text:
Of course, I know <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>. He's a very nice and gentle dog.
He's very big, too.
20030012.Chinese_Text:
狗？我知道小希望。它很乖很听话。
而且身体很大。

20030014.English_Text: Why? Is something wrong? Wait, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>'s gone missing?
20030014.Chinese_Text: 怎么了？发生了什么事？小希望失踪了？

20030015.Original_Text: 뭐 안타까운 일이긴 하지만... \n개 한 마리 사라지는 게 뭐 대수로운 일이라고.
20030015.English_Text:
Well, it is unfortunate...
But it's just a missing dog. It's not the end of the world.
20030015.Chinese_Text:
虽然很遗憾...
但一只狗失踪也没什么大不了。

20030016.English_Text: If he went out that way, he's more than likely dead.
20030016.Chinese_Text: 如果离开这里的话，肯定已经死了。

20030017.English_Text: I am searching just in case.
20030017.Chinese_Text: （表示抱有一丝希望，因此在寻找）

20030018.English_Text: Then, you should go and ask the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Patrol</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>waterfall</>.
20030018.Chinese_Text: 那就去瀑布那边问巡逻队员吧。

20030019.English_Text: I saw <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> walking alone toward the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>falls</>.
20030019.Chinese_Text: 我曾看到小希望去瀑布那边散步。

20030022.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 제가 그 부분까지는 파악하지 못해서...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 관련해서 답변드리긴 어려운데요.
20030022.English_Text:
Is that so? I haven't been able to keep an eye out...
I don't think I'll be able to tell you much about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>.
20030022.Chinese_Text:
原来如此。我也不了解相关情况...
关于小希望，我没有什么情报。

20030023.Original_Text: 개는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>만다라화</>가 내는 소리에 사람보다 민감하게 반응합니다.\n개는 사람이 듣지 못하는 부분까지 들으니까요.
20030023.English_Text:
Dogs are more sensitive than people to the sounds that a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandarava</> makes.
They can hear what we can't.
20030023.Chinese_Text:
不过，狗对于曼陀罗发出的声音比较敏感。
因为狗能听到人听不到的声音。

20030024.English_Text: If there's a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>dog</> here, it might've crossed paths with a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandarava</>.
20030024.Chinese_Text: 如果狗来到这里的话，可能与曼陀罗发生了冲突。

20030025.Chinese_Text:
（表示明白，
继续在附近寻找）

20030027.English_Text:
I might not know much about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>that dog</>...
But wouldn't his <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>master</> be able to recognize him?
20030027.Chinese_Text:
我不认识这只狗...
不过狗主人应该能认出来吧？

20030029.English_Text: Then, I'll return this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</> to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>owner</>.
20030029.Chinese_Text: 那由我来把铃铛交给狗主人吧。

20030030.English_Text: That <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>dog</> must've been attacked by a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandarava</>.
20030030.Chinese_Text: 狗多半已经惨遭曼陀罗毒手了。

20030031.Original_Text: 그 부분에 관해서 설명을 잘해야겠네요.\n쉽진 않겠지만 말이죠.
20030031.English_Text:
I should explain what happened delicately.
This won't be easy.
20030031.Chinese_Text:
我会就此好好解释。
当然不会很简单。

20030032.English_Text: I'll leave it up to you.

20030033.Original_Text: (뭔가 혼이 빠진 듯한 얼굴을 하고 있다)
20030033.English_Text: (It kooks like he's lost his mind.)

20030034.Original_Text: 예? 혹시 저한테 무슨 말씀 하셨습니까?\n제가 못들었는데 다시 한번 말씀해 주시겠어요?
20030034.English_Text:
Huh? Did you say something to me?
I'm sorry, but could you repeat what you said?
20030034.Chinese_Text:
咦？你对我说了什么吗？
我没有听到，可以再说一次吗？

20030035.Original_Text: (아직 걸지 않았다고 한다.\n복잡한 얼굴이라며 괜찮은지 묻는다)
20030035.English_Text:
I haven't said anything.
Are you all right?
20030035.Chinese_Text:
（表示还没有说话，
他看起来一脸忧愁，问发生了什么事）

20030036.Original_Text: 아... 제가 속마음을 잘 감추진 못하나 봅니다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부 생태 조사림</> 쪽에 나가 있는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>동료</>가 걱정돼서요.
20030036.English_Text:
Oh... I was careless to let out my feelings like that.
I'm worried about my <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>colleagues</> out at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>.
20030036.Chinese_Text:
唉...看来我藏不住自己的心思。
我很担心前往东部生态调查林的同伴。

20030037.English_Text: We were <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>friends</> from a young age, and we came to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</> together...
20030037.Chinese_Text: 她是我从小一起长大的好友，也一起来到了海越大陆...

20030038.English_Text: Is there a problem in that area?

20030039.English_Text: Rumor has it that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</> is active again.
20030039.Chinese_Text: 听说灰色雪怪最近开始了活动。

20030041.Original_Text: 저도 실제로 본 적은 없습니다만, 엄청난 괴물이라고 합니다.\n혹시 괜찮으시면 제 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>동료</>를 도와주시겠습니까?
20030041.English_Text:
I haven't seen it for myself, but I've heard that it's a terrifying monster.
If it's all right with you, would you help my <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>colleagues</>?
20030041.Chinese_Text:
我也没有亲眼见过，只听说是非常厉害的怪物。
如果方便的话，可以请你去帮助我的同伴吗？

20030042.English_Text: Ah, how may I help you?

20030043.English_Text: This is what I came for... (...)

20030044.Original_Text: 아... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>황태</> 녀석이 그런 이야기를...\n요즘 인근에 나타나는 괴물의 수가 감당할 수 없게 늘어났습니다.
20030044.English_Text:
Ah, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hantae</> really shouldn't have...
Recently, the number of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>animals in the jungle</> has grown out of hand.
20030044.Chinese_Text:
唉...黄泰那家伙真是多嘴...
最近密林动物的数量急剧攀升，超出了我们能够承受的范围。

20030045.Original_Text: 일반인들의 출입을 막는 것은 물론... \n저희도 순찰을 못 하고 있어요.
20030045.English_Text:
We've restricted people from entering,
and we ourselves can't go out on patrol, either.
20030045.Chinese_Text:
不仅禁止普通人出入...
连我们也无法进行巡逻。

20030046.Original_Text: 잘못 포위당하면 어떻게 될지 알 수 없거든요.\n혹시 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>라도 나오면...
20030046.English_Text:
We don't know what will happen if we get surrounded.
At worst, we might run into <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>...
20030046.Chinese_Text:
如果不慎被包围的话，后果不堪设想。
万一连灰色雪怪也出现的话...

20030047.Chinese_Text: （问灰色雪怪是什么样的怪物）

20030048.Original_Text: 사실 본 적은 없습니다만 엄청난 괴물입니다.
20030048.English_Text: To be honest, I haven't seen it for myself, but it's a formidable monster.
20030048.Chinese_Text: 其实我也没有亲眼见过，但那是非常厉害的怪物。

20030049.Original_Text: 대원 중에서도 이미 희생자가 나왔습니다.\n현재 정확한 위치를 찾지 못했습니다.
20030049.English_Text:
We've already suffered casualties among the men.
We don't even know the exact whereabouts of the monster.
20030049.Chinese_Text:
队员中也已经出现了牺牲者。
目前还没有掌握灰色雪怪的准确位置。

20030050.English_Text: I'll patrol the area and relay the situation.
20030050.Chinese_Text: （表示自己可以去里面巡逻并把情况告诉她）

20030051.Original_Text: 물론 능력엔 자신 있으시겠지만... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>는 부디 조심하세요.\n저희가 대략적인 위치는 말씀드릴게요.
20030051.English_Text:
I don't doubt your skills, but please be careful of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>.
We'll give you an approximate location.
20030051.Chinese_Text:
我明白你对自己的实力有信心...但必须小心灰色雪怪。
我们会把大致的位置告诉你。

20030052.English_Text: (Is this the location they told me about?)
20030052.Chinese_Text: （是这里吗？队员们告诉我的地方？）

20030053.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>?
Well, it doesn't seem to be here.)
20030053.Chinese_Text:
（这里有灰色雪怪出没？
看起来应该不在这里...）

20030054.Original_Text: (다른 곳으로 가버렸거나\n잘못된 소문이 퍼진 것 같다)
20030054.English_Text:
(It must have either moved
or the rumors were wrong.)
20030054.Chinese_Text:
（多半是去了别的地方
或传闻有误传的部分）

20030057.Original_Text: 역시 괴물의 수가 너무 많군요.\n상부에 보고해야겠어요.
20030057.English_Text:
I knew there were too many animals.
I should report this.
20030057.Chinese_Text:
果然还是动物数量太多了。
我要报告给上级。

20030058.Original_Text: 당분간은 순찰도 멈추는 게 나을지 모르겠네요.
20030058.English_Text: It may be best for us to cease patrols for the time being.
20030058.Chinese_Text: 看来最好暂时停止巡逻。

20030060.Original_Text: 안쪽에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>는 없군요. \n그럼 현재 어디있는지 알 수 없는 상황이네요.
20030060.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</> wasn't there.
Given the current situation, we have no idea where it is.
20030060.Chinese_Text:
里面没有灰色雪怪。
那么现在无法知道它们到底在哪里。

20030061.Original_Text: 차라리 한 장소에서 보이면\n다른 쪽은 마음이 편할텐데...
20030061.English_Text:
Things would go much easier
if they were all in one place...
20030061.Chinese_Text:
如果它们聚集在一个地方的话，
其他地方倒是可以放心...

20030064.English_Text: I beg you, don't even bring that up.

20030065.English_Text: I'm completely ruined. There's no hope left.
20030065.Chinese_Text: 我已经完了，没有希望了。

20030066.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 곡식을 다 뜯어 먹는데...\n어떻게 할 도리가 없습니다.
20030066.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> ate all the grain...
And there's nothing I can do.
20030066.Chinese_Text:
绿角大鬼吃掉了所有粮食...
我完全束手无策。

20030068.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>야 원래 쭉 있었는데 최근 들어\n그 수가 미친 듯이 늘어나서...
20030068.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> have always been around,
but they suddenly grew in number...
20030068.Chinese_Text:
绿角大鬼原本就存在，
可是最近数量剧增...

20030069.Original_Text: 이제 감당할 수 없는 상태입니다.\n전 그냥 포기할랍니다. 물이나 먹고 살아야죠.
20030069.English_Text:
It's gotten out of hand.
I'm just going to give up. I'll deal with the hunger by filling my stomach with water, I guess.
20030069.Chinese_Text:
现在到了无法承受的地步。
我已经放弃了，以后只能喝西北风。

20030070.Original_Text: (뭔가 전문가들에게 방법을 물어보면 좋을 것 같은데...)
20030070.English_Text: (It would be good to ask the experts about what to do...)

20030072.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 갑자기 늘어난 문제는 안 그래도 확인하고 있었습니다.
20030072.English_Text: We're also looking into the sudden increase in <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>, too.
20030072.Chinese_Text: 你不说我们也在调查绿角大鬼数量突然剧增的问题。

20030073.English_Text: We still haven't figured out a solution, though...
20030073.Chinese_Text: 我们还没找到合适的解决办法...

20030074.Original_Text: 지금 결단을 내려야 한다면 우선 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>를 제거해야겠지요.
20030074.English_Text: If we had to make a decision right now, then it would be to eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>.
20030074.Chinese_Text: 就目前来说，只能尽力消灭绿角大鬼。

20030075.Original_Text: 그래서 고기를 얻어서 식량으로 쓰거나,\n고기 이외의 부산물은 비료로 가공하는 식으로요.
20030075.English_Text:
We can use their meat as food,
and use the rest of their bodies as fertilizer.
20030075.Chinese_Text:
肉可以用作粮食，
肉以外的其他副产物可用于加工肥料。

20030078.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>의 활동 반경이 넓어진 것 관련해선 저희도 대응 중입니다만...
20030078.English_Text: We're also responding to the widening spread of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>...
20030078.Chinese_Text: 我们也在对绿角大鬼活动半径增加的事情寻找对策...

20030079.Original_Text: 저희 예상을 훨씬 넘고 있어서 어려움을 겪고 있습니다.
20030079.English_Text: But we're having trouble. This problem is much worse than we expected.
20030079.Chinese_Text: 但情况远超我们的预想，因此遇到了很多困难。

20030080.English_Text: Our plan is to eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> and reclaim our farmland.
20030080.Chinese_Text: 我们会尽力消灭绿角大鬼，然后夺回农耕地。

20030081.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 나타난 것과 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 급증한 일이 연관이 있어 보입니다만...
20030081.English_Text:
It seems the appearance of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>
and sudden increase of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> are related...
20030081.Chinese_Text:
灰色雪怪的出现与
绿角大鬼数量剧增之间应该有什么关联...

20030082.English_Text: I don't have any concrete evidence yet, though.
20030082.Chinese_Text: 但我们还没有确凿的证据。

20030083.English_Text:
However, I will eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>
and reclaim the farmland.
20030083.Chinese_Text:
但是！我们一定会想方设法消灭绿角大鬼
并夺回农耕地。

20030085.English_Text:
(I suddenly feel
a strange sense of danger.)

20030086.English_Text:
(The atmosphere inside
seems to be heavy.)
20030086.Chinese_Text:
（里面的气氛
有些不对劲）

20030087.Chinese_Text:
（灰色雪怪
会不会在这里？）

20030088.English_Text:
(I shouldn't enter now
since I don't have any business here.)
20030088.Chinese_Text:
（若不是非去不可的话，
最好还是不要进去）

20030089.English_Text: This is the opinion of the experts... (...)

20030090.Original_Text: 말씀은 감사합니다만...\n제가 할 수 있는 건 아무것도 없는 거군요.
20030090.English_Text:
I appreciate what you said...
But there's really nothing I can do.
20030090.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你告诉我...
但我还是没有什么可以做到的事情。

20030092.English_Text:
Still, since you know the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> and the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>,
I'm sure something can be done.
20030092.Chinese_Text:
不过四虎和搜阳既然已经知道了，
应该会做些什么吧。

20030093.Original_Text: (그러고 보니 숲 안쪽에\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>분위기가 특이한 장소</>가 있었다고 한다)
20030093.English_Text:
There was a
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>place with a strange atmosphere</> inside the forest.
20030093.Chinese_Text:
（说森林里面有一个
气氛奇特的场所）

20030094.Original_Text: 요즘 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 관측되지 않고 있다고 하던데...\n혹시 그곳에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 있는 거 아닐까요?
20030094.English_Text:
I heard <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</> hasn't been spotted these past few days...
Perhaps <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>'s over there?
20030094.Chinese_Text:
听说最近没有发现灰色雪怪...
会不会就在那里呢？

20030096.Original_Text: 과거 사람들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>에 해를 가했다는 이야기가 있던데...\n사람들에게 복수하는 걸까요?
20030096.English_Text:
I heard that people in the past have tried to harm <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Baphomet</>...
Could it be that it wants revenge?
20030096.Chinese_Text:
听说人们在过去曾伤害过灰色雪怪...
它们是不是向人类报仇呢？

20030097.English_Text:
Anyway, I really do hope the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> and the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>
eliminate it. That monster is just horrifying...
20030097.Chinese_Text:
唉，真是可怕。希望搜阳或四虎
快点消灭它们。

20030098.Original_Text: 그건 그거고... 우선 전 제가 할 일을 해야겠네요.\n일단 이곳에서 농기구 관리나 하고 있겠습니다.
20030098.English_Text:
Well, that's that... First, I should focus on my job.
I'll be managing the tools here.
20030098.Chinese_Text:
先不说这件事...我要做自己该做的事。
我会在这里管好种子。

20030281.Original_Text: 근데 농기구 관리를 하려고 해도...\n가진 게 없으니 뭔가 살 수가 없군요.
20030281.English_Text:
Even if I wanted to take care of the tools...
I can't buy anything since I'm broke.
20030281.Chinese_Text:
但即使想管理设施...
我手无分文无法购买任何东西。

20030282.English_Text: Is there anything you can do?

20030283.Original_Text: 그래도 제가 손기술은 좀 있으니...\n자재만 있으면 어떻게든 할 수 있을 것 같습니다.
20030283.English_Text:
Well, I'm good with my hands...
I could try to make something if I had the materials.
20030283.Chinese_Text:
还好我手艺不错...
只要有一些材料就会有办法。

20030284.English_Text: How are you going to get the materials?

20030285.English_Text: I'm going to go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>beach</> and collect some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>debris</>.
20030285.Chinese_Text: 我想去海边拾取一些残骸。

20030287.Original_Text: 어차피 굶어 죽으나 맞아 죽으나 같은 거니까요.
20030287.English_Text: Well, I either starve to death or I get beaten and killed.
20030287.Chinese_Text: 反正饿死或被打死都差不多。

20030288.English_Text: (Requesting an attack on the explorer base. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Signed, Im</>)

20030289.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>임씨 성을 가진 자</>가 요청했던 것 같다. \n이름 부분을 일부러 지웠는지 읽을 수가 없다)
20030289.English_Text:
(It seems to be a request from a person whose <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>last name is Im</>.
The first name has been erased.)
20030289.Chinese_Text:
（看来是一个姓林的人请求的。
不知道是不是故意抹去了名字部分，无法看清）

20030290.Original_Text: (임? 일단 요청자는 넘어가고 다음 내용을 계속 읽어보자)
20030290.English_Text: (Im? Forget the requester, and read the rest.)
20030290.Chinese_Text: （林？先不管是谁请求的，继续看后面的内容吧）

20030291.Original_Text: "(습격을 위해 도착했으나, 다음 연락이 없다.\n우린 습격을 포기하고 돌아가기로 했다)"
20030291.English_Text:
(We arrived for the attack, but didn't receive our next orders.
We subsequently decided to give up the attack and retreat.)
20030291.Chinese_Text:
（“为了发动袭击而抵达了目的地，但是没有后续联络。
我们决定放弃袭击，返回基地。”）

20030292.Original_Text: "(지금 해류와 바람으론 돌아갈 수 없으니, \n사흘 동안 조용히 숨어 있다 돌아가도록 하자)"
20030292.English_Text:
(Since we can't return because of the current and the winds,
we'll hide for three days and then go back.)
20030292.Chinese_Text:
（“以目前的海流与风向来看，无法在海上航行。
悄悄躲藏3天后再回去吧。”）

20030293.English_Text: (Perhaps they had no intention to attack the base?)
20030293.Chinese_Text: （难道他们没有袭击据点的意图？）

20030294.Original_Text: 이 무거운 걸 다 가져오신 겁니까?
20030294.English_Text: Did you bring all this? It must've been heavy.
20030294.Chinese_Text: 你把这么重的东西都带回来了？

20030295.English_Text: There were a lot of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</> near the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>shipwreck</>.
20030295.Chinese_Text: （表示遇难船周围有很多材料）

20030296.Original_Text: 이거라면 농기구를 만들 수 있을 것 같습니다.
20030296.English_Text: I think I can make some farming tools with these.
20030296.Chinese_Text: 有这些材料就能建造农业设施。

20030297.English_Text: Wasn't it dangerous to get these?

20030298.English_Text: There were <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>, but it was no big deal.
20030298.Chinese_Text: （那里的青人族...不，没有什么特别的事）

20030299.English_Text: It's a relief that nothing happened...

20030301.Original_Text: 뭐 당장 농사를 시작할 수는 없지만...\n언제라도 시작할 수 있는 상태까진 만들어 두려고요.
20030301.English_Text:
Well, I can't start farming right away...
But I'm going to make it so that I can start farming once I'm ready.
20030301.Chinese_Text:
现在还无法开始农活...
但我想做好随时都可以干活的准备。

20030302.English_Text: Looks like I've finally found some hope! Thank you.
20030302.Chinese_Text: 我看到了一丝希望！非常感谢。

20030101.Original_Text: 저는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>에 중독되어 죽는 사람들을 위해 약을 개발하고 있는데요.
20030101.English_Text: I'm currently developing an antidote for those dying from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecap</> poisoning.
20030101.Chinese_Text: 我为了救中蛇头菇中毒的人们制作解毒药。

20030102.Original_Text: 이게 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>의 독을 이용해서 약을 만드는 거라서...\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>의 독을 구해야 하거든요.
20030102.English_Text:
But since this is an antidote created from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecap</> poison...
I need to get my hands on some of that poison.
20030102.Chinese_Text:
方法是利用蛇头菇的毒...
所以需要获得蛇头菇的毒。

20030103.Original_Text: 물론 저도 소량 정도는 어떻게 해보겠는데요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>에 당하는 사람은 너무 많고...
20030103.English_Text:
I could collect it myself if I only needed a small quantity.
But there are so many people falling victim to the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>...
20030103.Chinese_Text:
当然我也能获得少量的毒。
但中蛇头菇毒的人又太多...

20030104.Original_Text: 약은 시간이 흐르면 약효가 사라지고...\n제가 할 수 있는 게 너무 제한적이네요.
20030104.English_Text:
The antidote loses its effectiveness over time, too.
There's a limit to what I can do on my own.
20030104.Chinese_Text:
解毒药会在一段时间之后慢慢失去药效...
我能做到的事情太少了。

20030106.Original_Text: 그냥 자기만족 같은 거예요. \n사람들을 돕고 나면 좀 뿌듯하기도 하고...
20030106.English_Text:
It is pretty satisfying work.
Helping people like this gives me a lot of pride...
20030106.Chinese_Text:
这只是一种自我满足而已。
我在帮助人们之后会感到自豪...

20030107.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>을 가져오면 약을 만들 수 있는지 묻는다)
20030107.English_Text: Could you make more antidote if you had more <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>?
20030107.Chinese_Text: （问带来蛇头菇的话是不是可以制作解毒药）

20030108.Original_Text: 사실은 독만 채취하면 되는데... 그건 기술이 필요하니까요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>을 잡아 오시면 약을 만들 수 있죠.
20030108.English_Text:
Well, I have the skills, so all I need is that poison.
I can make the antidote if you bring me <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>.
20030108.Chinese_Text:
其实只需要毒素...但那需要专业技术。
只要你能抓来蛇头菇，我就能制作解毒药。

20030109.Original_Text: 오셨군요. 이 정도면 약 몇 개는 나오겠네요.\n이것들의 독을 추출하고...
20030109.English_Text:
You're back. This will be enough to make a small batch of antidote.
First, I need to extract the poison...
20030109.Chinese_Text:
你回来了。有这么多蛇头菇应该能做出几个解毒药。
提取这些蛇头菇的毒...

20030110.Original_Text: 남은 버섯은 여기서 전골 재료로 쓰거나, \n발효시키다가 주정을 넣고 버섯주를 만들면... 룰루루
20030110.English_Text:
The leftover mushroom can be used for stew,
or it can be fermented to make mushroom beer. Just thinking about it makes my mouth water.
20030110.Chinese_Text:
剩下的蘑菇可以用作火锅材料，
也可以经过发酵后做成蘑菇酒...呵呵呵...

20030111.Original_Text: 이게 아주 별미거든요. 없어서 못 팔아요!
20030111.English_Text: It's an absolute delicacy! You can't just buy it in stores.
20030111.Chinese_Text: 蘑菇酒极其美味。在市场上简直供不应求！

20030112.Original_Text: 버섯주는 사람들이 막 미쳐요! \n독이 들어있는지 많이들 물어보는데...
20030112.English_Text:
Mushroom beer can drive a person nuts!
A lot of people ask if it's poisonous...
20030112.Chinese_Text:
人们对蘑菇酒趋之若鹜！
很多人问有没有毒...

20030113.Original_Text: 사실은 없어요. 근데! \n극소량 들었다고 하면 다들 좋아 죽어요.
20030113.English_Text:
But actually, there isn't a single drop of poison. However...!
If you tell them there's just a little bit, they enjoy it more.
20030113.Chinese_Text:
事实上没有毒。但是！
如果说有极少量毒的话，人们都更喜欢得不得了。

20030114.Original_Text: 독 있다는데 왜 좋아하는 거야?\n세상엔 이상한 사람들이 참 많아요. 그렇지 않아요?
20030114.English_Text:
Why do they prefer it if has some poison in it?
Well, there's a lot of strange people in this world with strange tastes. Don't you agree?
20030114.Chinese_Text:
人们为什么喜欢有毒的东西？
世界上有很多奇怪的人。对吧？

20030115.English_Text: Be honest... Isn't making mushroom stew or mushroom beer your real objective?
20030115.Chinese_Text: （问她的目的是不是蘑菇火锅或蘑菇酒）

20030116.Original_Text: 모르는 소리 마세요. 그것들로 수익을 안 내면\n약 하나에 순금으로 한 냥은 받아야 할 텐데...
20030116.English_Text:
It may seem like that, but I have to make money on the side somehow.
Otherwise, I'd have to charge money for the antidote...
20030116.Chinese_Text:
请不要说这种傻话。若不通过这种途径创造利润，
解毒药的价钱会提高至一两纯金...

20030117.Original_Text: 돈 없는 사람은 그냥 죽으란 소립니까? \n이게 다 버섯주를 비싼 값에 사가니까 가능한 거예요.
20030117.English_Text:
Do you want the poor to just die?
This is all possible because people buy the mushroom beer at a high price.
20030117.Chinese_Text:
难道要让穷人静静等死吗？
解毒药会便宜是因为有人以高价购买蘑菇酒。

20030118.Original_Text: 전골과 버섯주에 감사해야 마땅하죠.\n나중에 시간 되면 전골 한 냄비 하실래요?
20030118.English_Text:
We should be grateful I can make stew and mushroom beer.
Would you care for a pot of stew later?
20030118.Chinese_Text:
大家应该感谢蘑菇火锅与蘑菇酒。
以后有机会的话，来尝一下蘑菇火锅吧？

20030119.English_Text: There are ghosts showing up? Maybe he's seeing things?
20030119.Chinese_Text: 出现了魂灵？难道看到了幻影？

20030121.Original_Text: 저는 그런 게 잘 안 보이는데, \n친구가 이번에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>위령묘지</>에 발령이 나서요.
20030121.English_Text:
I don't usually believe in this sort of thing,
but there's a guy who has been dispatched to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Pioneers' Graveyard</>.
20030121.Chinese_Text:
我看不到那种东西，
但朋友这次被分配到了公墓。

20030122.Original_Text: 거기 가더니만 갑자기 혼령을 봤다고...\n더 그곳에서 근무 못 하겠다고 그러는 거예요.
20030122.English_Text:
He's saying he's seen ghosts...
And that he can no longer work there.
20030122.Chinese_Text:
朋友去那里之后突然说看到了魂灵...
说无法继续在那里工作。

20030124.Original_Text: 전 모르죠. \n그런 기운을 잘 못 느껴서요.
20030124.English_Text:
I don't know.
I suppose I wouldn't even be able to tell.
20030124.Chinese_Text:
我不知道。
我感受不到那种气息。

20030125.English_Text:
If it's all right with you,
I'd be grateful if you could check it out.
20030125.Chinese_Text:
如果可以的话，
请大侠去确认一下好吗？

20030127.English_Text:
Yikes! You surprised me!
I thought you were something else!
20030127.Chinese_Text:
啊！吓死我了！哎哟！
我还以为出现了奇怪的东西！

20030129.English_Text: I've come to check if there are ghosts.
20030129.Chinese_Text: （表示来确认是否真的出现了魂灵）

20030130.Original_Text: 아. 제가 얼마 전 순찰 중에 느낌이 왔거든요.\n물론 제가 살짝 민감하긴 한데...
20030130.English_Text:
Ah. I had a strange feeling during my patrol a while ago.
Well, I am a little more sensitive to this sort of stuff than others...
20030130.Chinese_Text:
唉，我不久之前在巡逻中感受到了。
虽说我也有些敏感...

20030131.Original_Text: 이제 와서 생각해보면 딱히 악의를 느꼈던 건 아니었어요.
20030131.English_Text: Come to think of it, it didn't seem like a hostile presence.
20030131.Chinese_Text: 现在回想起来，感受到的并不是恶意。

20030132.English_Text: But isn't it a little creepy?

20030133.Original_Text: 그리고 혹시 그때 이후로 저한테 악의를 품었을지도?
20030133.English_Text: Maybe it might've become hostile toward me over time?
20030133.Chinese_Text: 而且也可能在那之后对我产生了恶意吧？

20030134.Original_Text: 그냥 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>묘지</>관리는 관둘 겁니다. \n배치 안 바꿔주면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 관두죠. 뭐.
20030134.English_Text:
I'm just going to quit working at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</>.
If they won't let me work somewhere else, I'm going to leave the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20030134.Chinese_Text:
我不想继续管理墓地。
如果不给我换的话，我想离开搜阳。

20030136.Original_Text: 여기 소속은 아니고요. 이 근처를 지나고 있었는데...
20030136.English_Text: I don't belong here. I was just passing by...
20030136.Chinese_Text: 我不在这里工作。我只是经过附近而已...

20030137.Original_Text: 저번에 다른 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 대원을 보게 되어 \n같이 비석을 정리하자고 말하려고 했는데
20030137.English_Text:
I saw another <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seeker</> member last time
and tried to ask him to clean the tombstone.
20030137.Chinese_Text:
我上次见到其他搜阳队员时，
本来想说一起整理石碑，

20030138.Original_Text: 제 말은 들은 척도 안 하고 어디론가\n가버리더라고요.
20030138.English_Text:
But he just kept going on his way,
as if he hadn't heard me.
20030138.Chinese_Text:
可他装作没听见
就直接走掉了。

20030139.Original_Text: (그분은 혼령이 말을 걸었다고 생각한 것 같다고 답한다)
20030139.English_Text: He seemed to think that a ghost talked to him.
20030139.Chinese_Text: （表示那个人可能是误会魂灵在搭话）

20030140.Original_Text: 아. 그렇군요. 여긴 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>묘지</>니까 그렇게 생각할 수도 있겠네요.\n앞으로 조심해야겠네요...
20030140.English_Text:
Oh, really? I guess that'd make sense in a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</>.
I should be more careful from now on...
20030140.Chinese_Text:
原来如此。这里是墓地，对方会那样想也很正常。
我以后会小心...

20030141.Original_Text: 저쪽에 사악한 기운을 가진 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>영혼불</>들이 있던데...\n저런 것들때문에 악한 존재라고 오해를 사는 거 아닐까요?
20030141.English_Text:
There were <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fiery Souls</> over there with evil energy...
Maybe they're what's causing these misunderstandings.
20030141.Chinese_Text:
那边有一些散发邪恶气息的灵魂火...
会不会是因为灵魂火才被人们误会有邪恶存在呢？

20030143.Original_Text: 혹시 괜찮으시면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>영혼불</> 퇴치를 요청해도 될까요?\n제가 지금 상태가 좋지 않아서 힘을 쓸 수가 없네요.
20030143.English_Text:
If it's all right with you, may I request for you to eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fiery Souls</>?
I'm not in my best condition, so I can't get the job done.
20030143.Chinese_Text:
可以请你消灭灵魂火吗？
我现在身体不佳，无法使力。

20030144.Original_Text: (그리고 피곤해 보이니 경치 좋은 곳에 가서\n좀 쉬는 게 좋겠다고 한다)
20030144.English_Text:
You should get some rest somewhere with some relaxing scenery.
You look very tired.

20030145.English_Text: So, find anything out of the ordinary?

20030146.English_Text: I wasn't able to find any special ghosts.

20030147.Original_Text: 그러셨군요. 다행입니다.\n제가 착각한 걸 수도 있겠네요.
20030147.English_Text:
Is that so? That's a relief.
I guess I got the wrong idea somehow.
20030147.Chinese_Text:
是吗，太好了。
看来有可能是我的错觉。

20030148.English_Text:
I eliminated the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fiery Souls</>,
and cleaned the tombstone while I was at it.
20030148.Chinese_Text:
（说自己去那里整理石碑，
还消灭了灵魂火）

20030149.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 제가 해야 했던 일인데...\n저번에 막 도망치느라 아무것도 못했네요.
20030149.English_Text:
Thank you. I should've have been the one to handle that job...
I wasn't able to do anything last time since I was too busy running away.
20030149.Chinese_Text:
谢谢。那本来是我的工作...
上次我急于逃走，什么都没做。

20030150.English_Text:
I'll learn from my mistakes this time
and work hard as the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</> keeper again!
20030150.Chinese_Text:
我会反省，
重新努力当个合格的墓地管理兵！

20030153.English_Text: Why are you keeping your distance like that?

20030155.Original_Text: 딱히 오늘 특별한 일이 없으시다면\n같이 꽃이나 보러 가지 않으시겠습니까?
20030155.English_Text:
If you're not busy,
would you like to go see the flowers with me?
20030155.Chinese_Text:
如果今天没有什么特别的事，
要不要一起去赏花？

20030156.English_Text: (Be silent as you don't have a good answer.)

20030157.Original_Text: 제가 이상한 말이라도 했나요?\n꽃이 필요한데 도움이 필요해서요.
20030157.English_Text:
Did I say something strange?
I need some flowers, along with some help.
20030157.Chinese_Text:
我说了什么奇怪的话吗？
我需要花，所以需要帮助。

20030158.Chinese_Text: （问是不是风白门队员们的墓地）

20030159.Original_Text: 저도 정확히는 모릅니다.\n과거 탐사대가 이곳을 개척하며 많은 이들이 죽었고...
20030159.English_Text:
I don't know for sure.
A lot of explorers died trying to explore this place in the past...
20030159.Chinese_Text:
我也不清楚。
探查队过去开拓这里时牺牲了很多人...

20030160.Original_Text: 제대로 사람들을 묻고 추모할 여유가 없었어요.
20030160.English_Text: They weren't able to bury and pay proper respects to the dead.
20030160.Chinese_Text: 当时没有余力妥善埋葬死者或进行追悼。

20030161.Original_Text: 그래서 근처에서 그나마 땅의 상태가 안정적이었던\n이곳에 공동으로 매장했다고 들었습니다.
20030161.English_Text:
I heard that's why they buried everybody together here,
where the condition of the land was comparably better.
20030161.Chinese_Text:
我听说探查队当时只能把死者一同埋葬在
土地状态相对良好的这个地方。

20030163.Original_Text: 저희 아버지도 이곳 어딘가 계실 거예요.\n정확히 어딘지는 모르죠. 그래서...
20030163.English_Text:
My father is also buried around here.
I just don't know where exactly. So...
20030163.Chinese_Text:
我的父亲应该也在这里的某个角落。
当然我也不知道准确位置，所以...

20030164.Original_Text: 여기 올 때마다 매번 다른 묘비 앞에다 꽃을 두고 갑니다.\n언젠가 한 번은 아버지께 꽃을 올릴 수 있을 것 같아서요.
20030164.English_Text:
Whenever I come here, I leave a flower at a different tombstone.
One of these days, I'll actually give a flower to my father.
20030164.Chinese_Text:
每次来到这里时，我都会给不同的墓碑献花。
我想这样一来总有一次会给我父亲献花。

20030166.Original_Text: 꼭 아버지가 아니어도 선배님들께\n인사드린다는 의미도 있으니까요.
20030166.English_Text:
Well, even if it's not my father,
I'm still showing respect for the departed.
20030166.Chinese_Text:
就算不是父亲，也可以当做是给其他前辈们致敬，
因此并不是毫无意义。

20030167.Original_Text: 여기 혼자 오면 갈 때 좀 우울하거든요.\n근데 오늘은 괜찮을 것 같습니다.
20030167.English_Text:
It's a little depressing coming here alone.
I think I'll be fine today, though.
20030167.Chinese_Text:
我独自来这里的话，离开时会感到有些抑郁。
不过今天感觉好多了。

20030168.English_Text: It's all thanks to you. I really appreciate your help today.

20030169.English_Text: If we only knew where the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>' base was located...
20030169.Chinese_Text: 只要能知道赤匪派基地的位置...

20030170.Original_Text: 정확한 증거가 있어야 대병력을 움직일 수 있을 텐데...
20030170.English_Text: We can only move the troops after we get concrete evidence...
20030170.Chinese_Text: 必须有确凿的证据才能动员大规模兵力...

20030171.English_Text: Is something going on at the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>' base.?
20030171.Chinese_Text: （问赤匪派基地发生了什么事）

20030172.English_Text: Ah! Greetings. It's not that important.

20030173.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>풍요 우림 거점</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 숲 개척지</>는\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 전체의 물품 보급을 위해서...
20030173.English_Text:
For the entire supply of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>,
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Opulent Forest Base</>, and <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Foggy Forest Settlement</>...
20030173.Chinese_Text:
丰饶雨林据点与迷雾森林开拓地
是整个海越大陆的物资供应要道...

20030174.Original_Text: 많은 양의 물품이 오갑니다만...\n그걸 노리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>숲</>에 자리를 잡았습니다.
20030174.English_Text:
A lot of supplies go in and out of here.
That's why the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> have set up camp in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>woods</> in this area.
20030174.Chinese_Text:
有大量的物资会经过这里...
因此窥视物资的赤匪派被吸引到了林中。

20030175.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> will have a lot to worry about.

20030176.Original_Text: 그래 봐야 도적놈들에 불과하니\n우리의 정예대원들이 간다면 금방 토벌할 수 있습니다.
20030176.English_Text:
They'll be easily defeated if our Elites are deployed
, since they're only just thieves.
20030176.Chinese_Text:
他们不过是盗贼而已，
我们的精锐队员可以很轻松地讨伐他们。

20030177.Original_Text: 근데 문제는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들이 여기저기 도망 다니니... \n병력을 집중하기가 어렵습니다.
20030177.English_Text:
The main problem is that the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> are always running away and escaping,
and it's hard to get enough of our men to chase after them.
20030177.Chinese_Text:
问题在于赤匪派总是东逃西串...
我们难以集中兵力歼灭他们。

20030178.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>녀석들의 거점</> 위치만 정확히 알아낼 수 있으면\n이곳에서 몰아내는 일도 시간문제일 겁니다.
20030178.English_Text:
If we could locate the exact location of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>base</>,
it'll be only a matter of time before we drive them all out.
20030178.Chinese_Text:
只要能准确定位他们的据点位置，
把他们赶出这片森林也只是时间问题。

20030179.English_Text: Here is the location of the base, along with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>evidence</>.
20030179.Chinese_Text: （带着证据把基地位置告诉他）

20030180.English_Text: Is this true? Did you find this there?
20030180.Chinese_Text: 真的吗？在那里发现了这个证据？

20030181.Original_Text: 이거라면 상부를 설득할 충분한 증거가 될 것 같습니다.
20030181.English_Text: This will be concrete evidence to persuade the upper authorities.
20030181.Chinese_Text: 这个证据应该足够说服上级领导。

20030182.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>! We'll crush you for good this time.
20030182.Chinese_Text: 赤匪派那群混蛋！这次一定要粉碎他们。

20030183.Original_Text: 내가 특별 주문한 살구씨 두부를 훔쳐 간 책임을 져야지.
20030183.English_Text: You'll pay for stealing my custom-ordered peach tofu.
20030183.Chinese_Text: 我一定要让你们为偷走我特别订购的杏籽豆腐付出惨重代价。

20030185.Original_Text: 별말 아닙니다.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>을 좀먹는 벌레 같은 존재죠.
20030185.English_Text:
Never mind.
I just said the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> were pests eating away at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>.
20030185.Chinese_Text:
没什么。
赤匪派是海越大陆的蛀虫一样的存在。

20030186.English_Text: We, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>, will drive them out!
20030186.Chinese_Text: 我们搜阳一定会彻底消灭他们！

20030189.Original_Text: 아니 일을 하기로 했는데\n늦으면 어떻게 하냥?
20030189.English_Text:
How could you be so late
when you're supposed to work, mrrow?
20030189.Chinese_Text:
不是说好来这里工作吗，
怎么可以迟到喵？

20030190.English_Text:
Unacceptable, meow.
I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kuku</>, and I won't tolerate this, hiss.
20030190.Chinese_Text:
这样很让我困扰喵。
我是九九喵。绝对无法容忍这种事情喵。

20030191.Original_Text: 하지만 부드러운 떡, 굳은 떡 가릴 때가 아니다냥.
20030191.English_Text: Then again, beggars can't be choosers, mrrow.
20030191.Chinese_Text: 但现在不是挑软糕拣硬糕的时候喵。

20030192.English_Text: We should get going now, meow!

20030194.English_Text: Then, we'll figure it out later at the site, meow!

20030195.Original_Text: 안개 그늘이 사람들의 심신에 주는 영향을\n하루빨리 조사해야한다냥.
20030195.English_Text:
We must quickly research
the effect that the foggy shade has on people, meow.
20030195.Chinese_Text:
我们需要尽快调查雾影对人们的身心
造成的影响喵。

20030197.Original_Text: 왜 이리 늦은 거냥?\n나 이런 거 싫어하는 거 모르냥?
20030197.English_Text:
Why are you so late?
Don't you know I hate that, hiss?
20030197.Chinese_Text:
为什么来得这么晚喵？
不知道我讨厌有人迟到吗喵？

20030198.English_Text: I am <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kuku</>! This is unacceptable, hiss!
20030198.Chinese_Text: 我是九九喵！绝对无法容忍这种事情喵。

20030199.English_Text: Okay, calm down for a sec.

20030200.Original_Text: 하지만 달콤한 감과 쓴 감 가릴 때가 아니다냥.
20030200.English_Text: Now's not the time to be choosing between milk and fish, mrrow.
20030200.Chinese_Text: 但现在不是挑甜柿拣苦柿的时候喵。

20030201.English_Text: Go and collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dirt</> from over there!

20030203.Original_Text: 변명은 필요없다냥. 난 관대하다냥.\n이미 지나간 건 잊어버리고 작업에 집중하자냥!
20030203.English_Text:
I won't accept excuses, but I am forgiving, meow.
Let's forget about your mistake fur now and focus on our work!
20030203.Chinese_Text:
不需要什么借口喵。我很宽宏大量喵。
忘记过去的事情，专心投入工作喵！

20030204.Original_Text: 혹시 오해할까 봐 이야기하는데...\n지각했어도 보수는 전액 지급할 거다냥. 걱정 마라냥!
20030204.English_Text:
Just so that you don't misunderstand...
I will pay you in full, even though you were late. So don't worry, mrrow!
20030204.Chinese_Text:
我怕你会误会，所以提醒一下...
即使迟到也能拿到全额报酬，不要担心喵！

20030207.Original_Text: (오해할 수도 있는 거라며\n너무 당황하지 말라고 한다)
20030207.English_Text:
Don't get all startled.
It's just a small misunderstanding.
20030207.Chinese_Text:
（表示发生误会也很正常，
让他不要太慌）

20030208.Chinese_Text: 喵？！那个长得像洪梅花喵！

20030209.English_Text: Are you talking about the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom's Leader</>?

20030210.English_Text:
It's not right for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Leader</> to be here, mrrow!
It's the disgusting <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Mantis</>! Get rid of it, hiss!
20030210.Chinese_Text:
团长在这里感觉很奇怪喵！
令人不快的人面虫喵！快点消灭它喵！

20030211.Original_Text: 너 좀 쓸만한 것 같다냥. \n앞으로 내 짐꾼 및 경호원 하는 거 어떠냥?
20030211.English_Text:
You seem pretty useful, meow.
How about becoming my personal porter and bodyguard, meow?
20030211.Chinese_Text:
看来你还有点用喵。
以后当我的搬运工兼保镖如何喵？

20030212.English_Text: I have other things to do.
20030212.Chinese_Text: （说自己还有其他事，因此有点困难）

20030213.Original_Text: 다른 일? 내가 너희 회사랑 이야기해보겠다냥.
20030213.English_Text: Other things? Well, maybe I can negotiate with your company, meow.
20030213.Chinese_Text: 其他事？让我跟你的公司谈谈喵。

20030214.Original_Text: (자신은 회사 소속이 아니며\n다른 사람과 착각한 것 같다고 한다)
20030214.English_Text:
I don't belong to a company.
You must have mistaken me for someone else.
20030214.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己不属于公司，
他应该是认错人了）

20030215.Original_Text: 그런 거냥!? 왜 진작 말을 안 한 거냥?
20030215.English_Text: Mrrrrow, really? Why didn't you tell me earlier?
20030215.Chinese_Text: 是这样喵？！为什么不早说喵？

20030216.Original_Text: 왜 미리 말을 안 해서\n날 이상한 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>으로 만드는 거냥!
20030216.English_Text:
Why keep me in the dark?
You've made me look like a foolish <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baron</>!
20030216.Chinese_Text:
为什么不早说，
把我变成奇怪的巴隆喵！

20030218.English_Text: All right. I'll be fine, mrrow. I am a generous Baron after all.
20030218.Chinese_Text: 知道了喵。我没事喵。我很宽宏大量喵。

20030219.Original_Text: 회사고 뭐고 관계없이 \n나랑 같이 일할 마음은 없는 거냥?
20030219.English_Text:
How about working with me,
even if you're not from a company, meow?
20030219.Chinese_Text:
那就不管什么公司，
想不想跟我一起做事喵？

20030220.Original_Text: 넌 내가 보기엔 좀 쓸만한 것 같다냥.\n내 말을 좀 들어봐라냥.
20030220.English_Text:
You seem purretty useful.
Anyway, listen up.
20030220.Chinese_Text:
我觉得你还有点用喵。
听我说吧喵。

20030222.Original_Text: 현재 이곳엔 물이 별로 없지만, 과거엔 물이 많았다냥.
20030222.English_Text: There isn't a lot of water now, but there used to be lots of water in the past, meow.
20030222.Chinese_Text: 现在这里的水很少，但曾经有过很多的水喵。

20030223.Original_Text: "예전 초기 탐사대 소속이셨던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노다양</> 선생님께서 \n남기신 기록에 의하면..."
20030223.English_Text:
According to the records left by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Varahtti</>,
who was one of the first explorers...
20030223.Chinese_Text:
根据初期探查队“吴多样”先生
留下的记录...

20030224.Original_Text: 엄청나게 큰 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 나타나서 환각 안개를 내뿜기 시작했고, \n그 이후에 물이 메마르기 시작했다고 한다냥.
20030224.English_Text:
A huge <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Giant Mantis</> that creates an illusion fog recently appeared,
and that's when the water started to dry up, mrrow.
20030224.Chinese_Text:
巨大的[幻影大人面虫]突然出现并喷出幻觉迷雾，
之后水开始干枯喵。

20030225.English_Text: Are you listening to me, hiss?

20030227.Original_Text: 그래, 혹시 네가 위험에 빠질 수도 있으니 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 나오는 위치를 알려주겠다냥.
20030227.English_Text:
Right, so since you could get into danger,
I will tell you where the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Giant Mantis</> is purrported to appear, meow.
20030227.Chinese_Text:
很好，我怕你会陷入危险，
所以我要把[幻影大人面虫]出现的位置告诉你喵。

20030229.Original_Text: 사양하지 않아도 된다냥. \n다 널 걱정해서 그러는 거다냥. 간다냥!
20030229.English_Text:
There's no need to decline my help, mrrow.
It's all because I'm worried about you. Let's go.
20030229.Chinese_Text:
不要客气喵。
这都是为了你好喵。我走了喵！

20030230.Original_Text: "아까 이야기했던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노다양</> 선생님께선\n결국 환각 안개에 목숨을 잃으셨다냥."
20030230.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Varahtti</>, who I mentioned earlier,
lost his life to the illusion fog, meow.
20030230.Chinese_Text:
之前提到的“吴多样”先生
最终被幻觉迷雾夺走了性命喵。

20030231.Original_Text: 안개에 당한 자가 한둘이 아니었는데...\n병과 환각에 의해 죽어 나갔다고 한다냥.
20030231.English_Text:
There were many who fell victim to the illusion fog...
It's said they died from illusions and poisoning, hiss.
20030231.Chinese_Text:
迷雾夺走了很多人的性命喵...
听说疾病与幻觉会折磨死人喵。

20030232.Original_Text: 독은 소속 단체나 지위고하를 가리지도 않았다냥.
20030232.English_Text: Poison doesn't turn a blind eye when it comes to one's position or organization, meow.
20030232.Chinese_Text: 毒可不管你的所属团体或地位高低喵。

20030233.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 장로였던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비천</>이란 자도 다른 자를 보호하려고\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대인면충</>을 상대하다 목숨을 잃었다고 기록에 나온다냥.
20030233.English_Text:
It's also written in the records that an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> elder, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bichun</>,
was also killed by the Giant <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mantis</> while protecting others, meow.
20030233.Chinese_Text:
记录显示，风白门长老“飞天”也为了保护他人
在与大人面虫战斗中不幸丧命喵。

20030234.Original_Text: 저쪽에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 자주 출몰한다고 하니...\n혼자 상대하기 어려울 거다냥. 우선 도망쳐라냥.
20030234.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Giant Mantis</> is known to appear over there...
It'll be hard fur you to fight it alone. Run away once you get the chance, meow.
20030234.Chinese_Text:
听说那边经常有[幻影大人面虫]出没...
一个人很难对付喵。遇到的话要先逃走喵。

20030236.Original_Text: 애초에 인간이 이곳에 오지 않았다면,\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대인면충</>이 환각 안개를 뿜지 않았을지도 모른다냥.
20030236.English_Text:
Well, if people never came here in the first place,
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Giant Mantis</> might not have ever done what it did.
20030236.Chinese_Text:
如果当初人类没有踏足这片土地，
可能大人面虫不会喷出迷雾喵。

20030237.Original_Text: 그랬으면 사람도 죽지 않고,\n이곳의 물도 풍부하지 않았을까 생각해 본다냥...
20030237.English_Text:
Then, those people wouldn't have died,
and there'd still be lots of water here...
20030237.Chinese_Text:
那么既不会有人死去，
这里的水也会一直很丰富喵...

20030239.English_Text: (Should I tell him to back away a little?)

20030240.Original_Text: 어이! 뭐 하시는 거요? 물러서시오!\n여기서 떨어지면 위험하잖소.
20030240.English_Text:
Hey! What are you doing? Back away!
It's dangerous if you fall from here.
20030240.Chinese_Text:
喂！你在做什么？快点退后！
在这里掉下去会很危险。

20030242.Original_Text: 이곳 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>폭포</>는 경치가 좋아... 사람들이 접근하다가\n떨어져서 크게 다치거나 죽기도 했다오.
20030242.English_Text:
The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>waterfall</> here has the best scenery... So, people
often die or get hurt bad since they don't watch their step.
20030242.Chinese_Text:
这个瀑布景色优美...有不少人在靠近瀑布时
掉下去受伤或死亡。

20030243.Original_Text: 그러고 보니 예전에도 그랬지만, \n아직도 안전 난간이 하나 없구먼그래.
20030243.English_Text:
Come to think of it, this place
has never had any safety railing, huh?
20030243.Chinese_Text:
话说回来，这里从过去至今
一直都没有安全护栏。

20030244.Chinese_Text: 可以请你找来一些材料吗？

20030245.Original_Text: 내가 가기 전에 난간이라도 하나 만들고 가야겠소.
20030245.English_Text: I should make a safety railing before I leave.
20030245.Chinese_Text: 我想在离开之前做一点护栏。

20030246.Original_Text: 습기를 먹어도 괜찮을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>나무</>와 거기에 바를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기름</>...\n그 정도만 있으면 나머진 어떻게든 될 것 같소.
20030246.English_Text:
I just need some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wood</> that's resistant to water and some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>oil</> to coat it...
That should be enough. Bring me that, and I can take care of the rest.
20030246.Chinese_Text:
能够抵抗潮湿的树与涂抹在上面的油...
只要有这些材料就行，我会找办法搜集其他材料。

20030247.Original_Text: 오. 좋은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>로군. 이거면 안전 난간을 만들 수 있겠어.
20030247.English_Text: Oho. This is some fine <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>material</>. I can make some good safety railing out of this.
20030247.Chinese_Text: 嗯，材料质量不错。有了这些材料，我就能制造护栏了。

20030248.Original_Text: 그 사고가 나기 전에 설치했었어야 했는데...
20030248.English_Text: I should've done this before that accident happened...
20030248.Chinese_Text: 我本来应该在那个事故之前安装护栏...

20030249.Original_Text: 그랬으면 오늘 여기에도 같이 올 수 있지 않았을까?
20030249.English_Text: Then, maybe I wouldn't be alone here today.
20030249.Chinese_Text: 那么今天就可以一起来这里吧？

20030250.English_Text: Did something bad happen in the past?
20030250.Chinese_Text: （问过去是不是发生了什么事情）

20030251.Original_Text: 허허... 지난 일은 지난 일이고...\n앞으로 이곳에 다른 사고가 없었으면 좋겠군.
20030251.English_Text:
Well, there's nothing anyone can do about the past.
It would just be better if there weren't any accidents here anymore.
20030251.Chinese_Text:
呵呵...都已经过去了...
希望这里以后不要再发生事故。

20030252.Original_Text: 그래야 내 마음이 좀 편할 것 같구만...
20030252.Chinese_Text: 那样我才会感觉好受一点...

20030253.Original_Text: 내가 졌군... 이렇게 된 이상 내가 갈 수밖에...
20030253.English_Text: Help me deal with what I've lost. Well, I should get going...
20030253.Chinese_Text: 我输了...那么只能由我去...

20030254.Original_Text: 그동안 고마웠어. 전우들... \n내 유서는 서랍장 안에 있으니...
20030254.English_Text:
Thank you for everything, my friends...
My will is in my drawer...
20030254.Chinese_Text:
一直以来多谢了，我的战友们...
我的遗书在抽屉里...

20030256.Original_Text: 제가 가위바위보에서 지는 바람에... \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>을 관측하는 임무를 맡았습니다.
20030256.English_Text:
I lost at rock paper scissors...
Because of that, now I have to monitor <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</>.
20030256.Chinese_Text:
因为我在猜拳中输掉...
观察乐猿大圣的任务落在了我的身上。

20030257.Chinese_Text: （问那个任务是否真的很危险）

20030258.Original_Text: 아닙니다. 장난치고 있는 겁니다.\n대부분의 경우는 그리 위험하지 않습니다.
20030258.English_Text:
Well, not really.
Most of the time, anyway.
20030258.Chinese_Text:
不。我们只是开玩笑而已。
大部分情况下并不那么危险。

20030259.English_Text: Is it dangerous in certain cases?

20030260.Original_Text: 음... 그래서 유서는 써서 보관할 것을 권하고 있습니다.
20030260.English_Text: Hmm... That's why it's recommended to write a will and keep it somewhere safe.
20030260.Chinese_Text: 嗯...所以他们建议写遗书后保管。

20030261.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>의 기분에 따라 오늘은 어디까지 접근해도 되는지...\n대원이나 마차를 움직여도 될지 등을 결정하거든요.
20030261.English_Text:
How close we can approach <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</>, and whether we can move the men or wagons...
It's all depends on his mood.
20030261.Chinese_Text:
我们需要根据乐猿大圣的心情决定今天可以接近哪些地区...
队员和马车是否可以移动等事情。

20030262.Original_Text: 그래서 누군가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>을 관측할 필요가 있는 거예요.
20030262.English_Text: That's why someone needs to monitor <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</>.
20030262.Chinese_Text: 因此需要有人观察乐猿大圣。

20030263.English_Text: How do I determine his mood?
20030263.Chinese_Text: （问如何判断乐猿大圣的心情）

20030264.Original_Text: 교범 안에 다 있습니다. 오랜 시간 동안 정리해 왔죠.
20030264.English_Text: It's all in the manual. It's all important information that we've known for a long time..
20030264.Chinese_Text: 教范里记录了所有内容。我们整理了很长时间。

20030265.Original_Text: 어떤 행동이 어떤 기분이라고 하는 게 완전히 맞진 않지만,\n그래도 대부분 맞습니다.
20030265.English_Text:
It might not say which moods are linked to specific actions,
but the info in there is correct, most of the time.
20030265.Chinese_Text:
什么动作代表什么心情，虽然并不完全正确，
但大部分都不会有错。

20030266.English_Text: When do I have to be careful?

20030267.Original_Text: 대부분은 괜찮습니다. 일 년에 한 두 번 정도...\n극대노 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>일때가 있어요.
20030267.English_Text:
It's actually fine, most of the time. Maybe one or two days in a year...
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</> gets very angry.
20030267.Chinese_Text:
大部分时候都没问题。重要的是乐猿大圣...
每年都会有一两次极度愤怒的时候。

20030268.Original_Text: 그땐 관측병의 목숨이 위험할 수 있습니다.\n바로 철수해야 하죠.
20030268.English_Text:
Then, whoever is watching him is in grave danger.
You have to escape right away.
20030268.Chinese_Text:
那个时候观察兵会有生命危险。
必须马上撤退。

20030269.Original_Text: 부대로 돌아와 모든 활동을 멈추고,\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>의 출입을 금지하기도 합니다.
20030269.English_Text:
All men, return to the base immediately and cease all activities.
Using the entrance to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</> is also forbidden.
20030269.Chinese_Text:
回到部队中断所有活动，
还会禁止出入乐猿溪谷。

20030271.Original_Text: "어제 기분은 양호였습니다. 오늘도 아마 괜찮을 것 같은데...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>목치본</> 대원을 따라 가보시죠."
20030271.English_Text:
His mood was all right yesterday. He's probably fine today...
Just go and follow our fellow member, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Mok Chibon</>.
20030271.Chinese_Text:
乐猿大圣昨天的心情为“良好”。今天应该也不会有问题...
跟木治本队员一起去看看吧。

20030272.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>이 항상 같은 자리에 있는 건 아니지만...\n이곳은 관찰하기에 꽤 괜찮은 자리입니다.
20030272.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</> doesn't always stay in one place...
This spot, though, is great for monitoring him.
20030272.Chinese_Text:
乐猿大圣虽然并不总是在同一个地方...
但这里是很适合观察的地方。

20030274.Original_Text: 처음에는 잘 안 보일 수 있습니다.\n보다 보면 익숙해집니다. 금방 보이죠.
20030274.English_Text:
He's hard to see at first.
But you'll get used to it. It'll get easier.
20030274.Chinese_Text:
第一次看不清很正常。
看多了就会习惯，不需要太久。

20030275.English_Text: How is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</> feeling today?

20030276.Original_Text: 오늘은 소노 정도인 것 같습니다.\n더 접근하는 건 안 좋겠어요.
20030276.English_Text:
Today, he seems mildly angry.
We shouldn't get any closer to him.
20030276.Chinese_Text:
今天只是小怒而已。
最好不要继续接近。

20030277.English_Text:
Wow, that's amazing.
I can't even see a thing from here.
20030277.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己什么都看不清，
称赞对方了不起）

20030278.Original_Text: 하핫! 뭘요. 매일 보는 거니까요.\n조금 더 안쪽으로 가볼까요?
20030278.English_Text:
Heheh! It's nothing special. I've had a lot of practice.
How about we get a little closer?
20030278.Chinese_Text:
哈哈！过奖了。这只是我的日常工作。
要不要去更深处看看？

20030279.English_Text:
Is it okay to do that
when he's mildly angry?
20030279.Chinese_Text:
（问小怒状态
真的不会有事吗）

20030303.English_Text: I'm sorry. I got too cocky...

20030304.Original_Text: 소노일 때 섣부른 행동을 해서...\n괜히 낙원족을 자극했네요.
20030304.English_Text:
I shouldn't have done that when he was only mildly angry...
I've kind of riled up the Simyu tribe.
20030304.Chinese_Text:
在乐猿大圣处于小怒状态时擅自行动...
白白地刺激了乐猿族。

20030306.Original_Text: 일단 지금 당장은 괜찮습니다만...\n여길 벗어나는 게 좋겠습니다.
20030306.English_Text:
It should be fine for now...
But we should leave the area right away.
20030306.Chinese_Text:
现在暂时不会有问题...
但最好还是尽快离开这里。

20030307.English_Text:
We must never make
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong angry</>, no matter what!
20030307.Chinese_Text:
我们绝对不能
激怒乐猿大圣！

20030308.Original_Text: 어휴... 오늘 수명이 십 년 준 것 같네요.
20030308.English_Text: Phew... I think I've knocked ten years off my life expectancy today.
20030308.Chinese_Text: 唉...我感觉今天折寿了十年。

20030309.Original_Text: 아니... 거기도 우리 관할구역이야?\n하... 정말 너무 한 거 아닌가?
20030309.English_Text:
Wait... That's our jurisdiction, too?
Isn't that too much?
20030309.Chinese_Text:
什么！那里也归我们所管？
这太过分了吧！

20030311.Original_Text: 아! 오셨습니까? 무슨 일이냐구요? 그게...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 내부의 일이긴 합니다만...
20030311.English_Text:
Ah! You're here! What's wrong? Well...
This is an internal matter for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>, but...
20030311.Chinese_Text: 啊！你来了？虽然这只是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>内部的事情…

20030312.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>주변 해변</> 지역이\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</> 관할 지역이 아니라는 게 이상해서요.
20030312.English_Text:
I was questioning why the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</> and its <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>surrounding coasts</> are not
under <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>'s jurisdiction.
20030312.Chinese_Text:
那个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被遗弃的监视塔</>及<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>周围海边</>地区
竟然不归<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>所管，我觉得很奇怪。

20030313.English_Text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>coast</> looks pretty close to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>.
20030313.Chinese_Text: （表示从距离上来看，<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海边</>离<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>更近）

20030314.Original_Text: 근데 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>과의 거리는 거점이 가깝긴 합니다.
20030314.English_Text: But the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</> is closer to our base.
20030314.Chinese_Text: 不过据点离<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被遗弃的监视塔</>更近。

20030315.Original_Text: 그리고 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>감시탑</>을 중심으로 하여 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>주변 해변가</>가\n동일 관할구역으로 되어 있어서요.
20030315.English_Text:
And based on the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>watchtower</>, the surrounding <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>coastline</>
is designated as our jurisdiction.
20030315.Chinese_Text:
而且以<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>监视塔</>为中心，
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>周围海边</>都属于相同的管辖区。

20030316.Original_Text: (그렇게 생각하면 그것도 맞는 것 같다고 한다)

20030317.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</>에 주둔 병력도 많고 하니 \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>감시탑</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해변</>까지 맡아줘도 괜찮을 것 같은데...
20030317.English_Text:
It wouldn't be a bad idea to say that the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>coast</> over there belongs to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>,
and this side is our <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>base</>...
20030317.Chinese_Text:
我觉得在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海边</>划个线，把海岸划为两部分，
分别交给<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>据点</>也可以…

20030318.Original_Text: 이미 정해진 거니 어쩔 수 없죠.\n그냥 저희가 처리해야죠.
20030318.English_Text:
But we can't change that now.
I guess it's up to us to take care of it.
20030318.Chinese_Text:
但现实如此，我也没办法。
只能由我们亲手处理。

20030320.Original_Text: 예. 요즘 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해안 생물</>들이 이상 번식을 해서...\n감당할 수가 없는 수준입니다.
20030320.English_Text:
Yes. The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>coastal creatures</> have been reproducing at an abnormal rate...
It's getting out of hand.
20030320.Chinese_Text:
唔，最近<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>海岸生物</>异常繁殖…
到了无法承受的地步。

20030321.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</> 쪽에 부탁해서 고개를 숙이기도 싫고...\n그런 곤란한 상황입니다.
20030321.English_Text:
I don't want to go and ask <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</> for help, either...
We're in quite a pickle here.
20030321.Chinese_Text:
我们又不想低着头去拜托<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>…
因此很为难。

20030322.Original_Text: 이젠 근무 끝나고 가서 쉴 곳도 없다니깐...
20030322.English_Text: We don't even have a place where we can rest after our duties...
20030322.Chinese_Text: 现在下班之后都没有可以休息的地方…

20030323.Original_Text: 석양 보면서 청주 한잔하는 게 낙이었는데...
20030323.English_Text: Drinking Blue Liquor while watching the sunset was my one joy in life...
20030323.Chinese_Text: 本来我的乐趣是一边观赏夕阳一边喝清酒…

20030324.English_Text: Is there a place with a good view?

20030325.English_Text:
There used to be.
No, wait, it's still there.
20030325.Chinese_Text:
以前有过。
不，现在也有。

20030326.Original_Text: 거점 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>남쪽 해변가</>에 해 질 무렵에 가면 경치가 아주 좋거든요.
20030326.English_Text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>southern coast</> of the base has an amazing view during sunset.
20030326.Chinese_Text: 据点<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>南侧海岸</>的晚霞风景非常优美。

20030328.Original_Text: 예전에도 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 없는 건 아니었는데...\n이 정도는 아니었거든요.
20030328.English_Text:
It's not like there weren't any <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksinis</> before...
But things have gotten worse now.
20030328.Chinese_Text:
虽然<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>夜鬼</>一直都存在…
但从来没有这么多过。

20030329.English_Text:
Back when there were just a few of them, I could take care of them,
or avoid them if I felt like it...
20030329.Chinese_Text:
数量不多时，
我可以自己解决或避开夜鬼…

20030330.Original_Text: 요즘은 수가 너무 많아져서...\n이름을 그냥 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</> 해변이라고 불러야 할 정도예요.
20030330.English_Text:
But there are far too many of them now...
We might as well call that place <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</> Coast.
20030330.Chinese_Text:
但最近数量剧增…
简直可以称为<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>夜鬼</>海边了。

20030331.Original_Text: 청주 한잔 먹자고 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 대원들 다 데리고 가서\n해변 정리하자고 할 수도 없고요.
20030331.English_Text:
And it's not like I can drag along all the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> out there
and clear the coast so I can enjoy Blue Liquor.
20030331.Chinese_Text:
我也不能为了在那里喝一口清酒
就带上所有<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>队员去清理海边。

20030332.English_Text:
It must be upsetting
to lose such a great place to relax.
20030332.Chinese_Text:
（表示能理解转换心情的场所消失
让他很难过）

20030333.Original_Text: 맞습니다! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>고곤대</>님도\n가끔 술을 좀 드셔야 기분이 풀리시는데...
20030333.English_Text:
Exactly! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ko Gondae</> needs to have a drink
from time to time to let off some steam, too...
20030333.Chinese_Text:
没错！<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>古昆代</>大人
偶尔也需要喝酒才会有好心情…

20030334.Original_Text: 짜증 나면 저한테 막 푸신다니까요!\n제가 힘들어요. 뭐라고 할 수도 없고...
20030334.English_Text:
And when he's annoyed, he takes it out on me!
It's been getting pretty tough, and it's not like I can say anything about it...
20030334.Chinese_Text:
现在他不高兴的时候都会冲我发泄！
我很难受，又不能对他说什么…

20030335.Original_Text: 오! 괜찮으시면 혹시 길을 좀 여쭤봐도 괜찮을까요?
20030335.English_Text: Oh! If it's all right with you, can I ask you for directions?

20030337.Original_Text: 제가 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비경의 자드락</>으로 가는 길인데요.\n이제 거의 다 온 걸까요?
20030337.English_Text:
I'm on my way to a place called the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Magnificent Hillside</>.
Is it nearby?
20030337.Chinese_Text:
我正在前往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>秘境山脚</>。
是不是已经快到了？

20030338.English_Text: You are still pretty far from it.

20030340.English_Text: Me? I came from the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Foggy Forest Settlement</>.

20030341.English_Text: It seems you're going in the wrong direction.

20030342.Original_Text: 에이~ 그럴 리가요. 전 방향감각이 엄청 좋은데요.\n반대로 왔을 리가 없어요.
20030342.English_Text:
No way, I have a great sense of direction.
I'm sure I'm going the right way.
20030342.Chinese_Text:
哎呀~怎么可能。我的方向感非常好。
我不可能走错方向。

20030345.Original_Text: 요즘 세상이 흉흉하던데...\n뭔가 세상의 방향 축이 틀어졌다거나?
20030345.English_Text:
Given how chaotic the world is right now...
Could it be that the cardinal directions themselves have changed?
20030345.Chinese_Text:
最近世道凶险…
难道世界的方向轴发生了转变？

20030346.English_Text:
Hm. I can bring you
to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Foggy Forest Settlement</>.
20030346.Chinese_Text:
（不回答，表示可以
送对方回到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷雾森林开拓地</>）

20030347.Original_Text: 아! 여기에 오니 대략 알 것 같습니다.
20030347.English_Text: Ah! Now that I'm here, I think I can find my way.
20030347.Chinese_Text: 啊！我知道从这里开始该怎么走。

20030348.Original_Text: 이제 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비의 숲</> 정도 온 거죠?\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>는 조심하는 게 좋아요!
20030348.English_Text:
We're near the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Scarlet Masks Forest</>, right?
You'd better watch out for those<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>!
20030348.Chinese_Text:
这里已经是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>赤匪森林</>吧？
我们都需要小心<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>！

20030349.English_Text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Scarlet Masks Forest</> is still far away.

20030350.Original_Text: 엥? 제 거리방향감각은 사람들이\n막 놀랄 정도인데... 확실한 거예요?
20030350.English_Text:
What? People are often amazed by my sense of direction...
Are you sure?
20030350.Chinese_Text:
诶？大家都很惊叹于我的距离感和方向感…
你确定吗？

20030351.English_Text: (That sure is "amazing." But, I shouldn't say it out loud.)
20030351.Chinese_Text:
（心想确实是惊人的方向感，
但不说出口）

20030353.English_Text:
Can you make it to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Magnificent Hillside</>
by yourself?
20030353.Chinese_Text:
（问能不能一个人
找到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>秘境山脚</>）

20030354.English_Text:
Normally, that wouldn't be a problem...
But given how things are nowadays...
20030354.Chinese_Text:
平时当然没有问题…
但最近世道凶险…

20030355.English_Text:
I think I will ask the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Bridge</>
for a teleport.
20030355.Chinese_Text:
我最好还是拜托<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>灵交院</>
瞬移到目的地。

20030357.English_Text: And I wasted some time too, haha!
20030357.Chinese_Text: 浪费了一点时间呢，哈哈！

20030358.Original_Text: (혹시 자신도 같이 갈 수 있냐고 묻는다)

20030359.English_Text: Of course you can come with me.
20030359.Chinese_Text: 当然可以。跟我一起去吧。

20030360.English_Text: Just tell me when you're ready.
20030360.Chinese_Text: 准备好之后跟我说一声吧。

20030363.English_Text: We are here, safe and sound.

20030365.Original_Text: (앞으로도 장거리 이동할 때\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영교원</>에 가는 게 좋겠다고 한다)
20030365.English_Text:
It would be a good idea to ask for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Bridge</>'s service
when traveling such a long distance next time.
20030365.Chinese_Text:
（表示以后进行远距离移动时
最好还是找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>灵交院</>）

20030366.English_Text:
Right? Even though it's quite dizzying,
it is pretty convenient.
20030366.Chinese_Text:
说的没错，虽然有些头晕，
但身体没有那么辛苦。

20030368.Original_Text: 아~ 이제 앞이 깜깜하다. 앞이 안 보인다.
20030368.English_Text: Ah, now I have no idea what to do. I can't see anything ahead of me.
20030368.Chinese_Text: 唉~真是眼前一片黑，什么都看不清。

20030370.English_Text: Ah! No. I was just talking to myself.
20030370.Chinese_Text: 不！没什么。我只是自言自语而已。

20030371.Original_Text: 금주에 진행해야 할 작업을 생각하다 보니...\n갑자기 시야가 좁아져서요.
20030371.English_Text:
I was just thinking about all the work that needs to be done this week...
I was just stressing out over that.
20030371.Chinese_Text:
我一想到这周的工作就…
感觉眼睛都看不清了。

20030372.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>의 관측만 할 순 없는 거겠죠.\n이것도 당연히 해야 할 일입니다.
20030372.English_Text:
I suppose I can't just observe <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</> all week.
It's all part of my duty as well.
20030372.Chinese_Text:
我不能只观察<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>乐猿大圣</>。
这也是必要的工作。

20030374.English_Text:
I suppose you can call it weeding.
I need to remove <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bulbaries</> on a regular basis.
20030374.Chinese_Text:
应该说是一种除草工作？
我们需要定期清理<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>龇牙犬</>。

20030375.Original_Text: 아니네요. 풀 뽑다가 공격받아 죽진 않을 테니까...
20030375.English_Text: Then, again, if they were regular plants, my life wouldn't be in so much danger...
20030375.Chinese_Text: 也不对。除草可不需要冒着生命危险…

20030376.Original_Text: 전투 살충이라고 부르는 게 적절할 것 같습니다.
20030376.English_Text: I think combative extermination is probably a better term.
20030376.Chinese_Text: 我想还是应该称为战斗杀虫。

20030379.English_Text: You must be pretty confident in your skills since you made it all the way here...
20030379.Chinese_Text: 既然能来到这里，想必对自己的实力有自信…

20030380.English_Text: But still, you should watch out for <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dokumo</>.
20030380.Chinese_Text: 但最好还是小心<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>八毒母</>。

20030382.Original_Text: 극히 위험한 거대 괴물이라고 설명해 드리면 될까요?
20030382.English_Text: It's a huge and extremely dangerous monster.
20030382.Chinese_Text: 应该说是非常危险的巨型怪物吧？

20030383.English_Text: It normally doesn't leave its nest...
20030383.Chinese_Text: 一般不会离开自己的巢穴…

20030384.English_Text: But if it does, that's usually trouble.
20030384.Chinese_Text: 不过一旦离开就是很大的问题。

20030385.English_Text:
I will inform you right away
if I ever see <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dokumo</> nearby.
20030385.Chinese_Text:
（表示若在附近发现<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>八毒母</>
一定会来告诉情况）

20030386.Chinese_Text:
（说暂时还未在附近
发现<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>八毒母</>）

20030387.English_Text:
That's a relief.
Its <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>nest</> is in there.
20030387.Chinese_Text:
太好了。
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>巢穴</>就在那里面…

20030388.English_Text: Even if you're curious, do not approach it.
20030388.Chinese_Text: 请不要因为好奇心就靠近那里。

20030390.English_Text: Hey, you! Come over here for a second, mrrow!

20030392.Original_Text: 지금 약을 만들고 있는데\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이끼</>가 쪼끔 부족하다냥!
20030392.English_Text:
I'm making some medicine,
but I need a little more <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>moss</>, meow!
20030392.Chinese_Text:
我正在制作药物，
但缺少一些<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>苔藓</>喵！

20030393.English_Text: Um... Um... Actually, I need vewy much more moss, meow.

20030394.English_Text: It's okay. Tell me what you need.

20030395.English_Text:
It's a precious <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>moss</> that
only grows on living <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>tree spirits</>, meow!
20030395.Chinese_Text:
我需要的是只长在活着的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树精灵</>
身上的珍贵<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>苔藓</>喵！

20030396.English_Text: I need a little... no, vewy much of it, meow!
20030396.Chinese_Text: 需要一点…不，需要很多喵！

20030397.English_Text:
You want
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>moss</> from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>tree spirits</>?
20030397.Chinese_Text:
（问是不是只要从<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>树精灵
身上</>搜集<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>苔藓</>就行）

20030398.English_Text:
You can find it from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>tree spirits</>
at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunrise Climb</>, meow!
20030398.Chinese_Text:
从<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迎日坡路</>的
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树精灵</>身上搜集就可以喵！

20030400.English_Text: Wow! So much moss! Amazing, mrrow!
20030400.Chinese_Text: 哇！竟然有这么多！好厉害喵！

20030402.English_Text:
Don't say that, mrrow... I had to scratch a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>tree spirit</>'s back
for a whole hour,
20030402.Chinese_Text:
才不是呢…我可是
为<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树精灵</>挠一个小时背之后

20030403.English_Text:
But I only got one-eighth
of this, meow!
20030403.Chinese_Text:
才拿到了10分之1的分量
而已喵！

20030404.Original_Text: 어떻게 한 거냥? 나도 배우고 싶다냥!
20030404.English_Text: How did you do this? I want to learn, too, meow!
20030404.Chinese_Text: 你是怎么做到的喵？我也想学喵！

20030405.English_Text: Do you scratch a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>tree spirit</>'s back?

20030406.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Tree spirits</> love it
when you scratch their backs, mrrow!
20030406.Chinese_Text:
给<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树精灵</>挠背
会让它们很高兴喵！

20030407.Chinese_Text:
（含糊其辞地
表示真的不用客气）

20030409.Original_Text: 근처를 순찰하고 있는데... 갑자기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님이 계신 거예요.
20030409.English_Text: I was on patrol when... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</> of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> was suddenly there.
20030409.Chinese_Text: 我正在这附近巡逻…突然看到了<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花商廛</>的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>大人。

20030410.Original_Text: 저희 상관은 아니지만... 그래도 예의상 가서 인사를 드렸는데...
20030410.English_Text: Although he's not my superior, I politely greeted him but...
20030410.Chinese_Text: 虽然不算份内事…可我还是过去问候了一下…

20030413.Original_Text: 근데 자세히 봤더니! 이거 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님이 아닌 겁니다.
20030413.English_Text: But when I looked closely! He wasn't <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>.
20030413.Chinese_Text: 我仔细辨认了一下！发现那位不是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>！

20030415.English_Text: It was an <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion</>. I was deceived.

20030416.English_Text: But... I would have left it alone if it was just once...
20030416.Chinese_Text: 但…如果只是这样，我也不会放心上…

20030417.English_Text: But I met <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonwind</> on the way.
20030417.Chinese_Text: 走着走着，又看到了<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>月光疾风</>大人。

20030419.Original_Text: 그럼요! 가서 인사를 드렸죠. 근데... 또 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이네요.
20030419.English_Text: Of course! I greeted her. But... it was an <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion</> again.
20030419.Chinese_Text: 当然！我上前去打招呼，却发现…那又是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>幻影</>。

20030420.Original_Text: 아. 그 이후로 순찰 나가기도 싫더라고요.
20030420.English_Text: After that, I really don't want to go on patrol.
20030420.Chinese_Text: 啊，那之后我就不想去巡逻了。

20030421.English_Text: Can you get rid of those <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusions</> for me?
20030421.Chinese_Text: 可以帮我们消除那些<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>幻影</>吗？

20030422.Original_Text: (음... 아직 자기 상태에 대한 자각이 없는 걸까?)
20030422.English_Text: (Hmm... Are they still not aware of their own condition?)
20030422.Chinese_Text: （嗯……你还不知道自己的情况吗?）

20030423.Original_Text: (이렇게 혼령을 두려워한다면...\n사실을 말하지 않는 게 좋을지도 모르겠다)
20030423.English_Text:
(If they're this scared of ghosts...
Maybe it's better not to tell them the truth.)
20030423.Chinese_Text:
（如果你像这样害怕鬼……
最好不要说实话）

20030424.English_Text: You should leave the Fiery Souls to me.
20030424.Chinese_Text: （他们说让我来消灭灵魂之火）

20030425.Original_Text: 오, 소협이군요. 안그래도 소협이 생각나던 참이었습니다.
20030425.English_Text: Oh, that's a small group. That's what I was thinking of, though.
20030425.Chinese_Text: 오, 소협이군요. 안그래도 소협이 생각나던 참이었습니다.

20030427.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>가 통행로를 습격하는 일이 잦아지고 있다는 보고입니다. 더 이상 좌시할 수 없습니다. 그래서 소협께 부탁을 하나 할까 합니다.
20030427.English_Text: This is a report that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plague</> is attacking the passageways more often. I can't stand it any longer. So may I ask you a favor? do.
20030427.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>가 통행로를 습격하는 일이 잦아지고 있다는 보고입니다. 더 이상 좌시할 수 없습니다. 그래서 소협께 부탁을 하나 할까 합니다.

20030429.Original_Text: 함정을 만들어 배치할 계획입니다. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>암각다귀의 뿔</>을 준비해주시면 나머지 재료는 저희가 준비하겠습니다.
20030429.English_Text: I plan to create and place a trap. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Valley Windway</> in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rock Crow Horn If you prepare </>, we will prepare the rest of the ingredients.
20030429.Chinese_Text: 함정을 만들어 배치할 계획입니다. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>암각다귀의 뿔</>을 준비해주시면 나머지 재료는 저희가 준비하겠습니다.

20030430.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 소협. 덕분에 무사히 함정을 설치할 수 있었습니다.
20030430.English_Text: Thank you. Small. Thanks to you, we were able to set up the trap safely.
20030430.Chinese_Text: 감사합니다. 소협. 덕분에 무사히 함정을 설치할 수 있었습니다.

20030432.Original_Text: 이걸로 잠시나마 통행로의 안전이 확보되었으면 좋겠네요. 자 약소한 보상을 준비했습니다. 사양말고 받아주십시오. 그럼 무운을 빌겠습니다.
20030432.English_Text: I hope this will secure the passageway for a while. Now, I have prepared a small reward. Please accept it without hesitation. I wish you good luck.
20030432.Chinese_Text: 이걸로 잠시나마 통행로의 안전이 확보되었으면 좋겠네요. 자 약소한 보상을 준비했습니다. 사양말고 받아주십시오. 그럼 무운을 빌겠습니다.

20030434.Original_Text: 오, 자네. 안그래도 잘왔네. 자네한테 부탁할 게 하나 있네.
20030434.English_Text: Oh, dear. Well done anyway. I have a favor to ask of you.
20030434.Chinese_Text: 오, 자네. 안그래도 잘왔네. 자네한테 부탁할 게 하나 있네.

20030436.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 그늘 숲</>의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>들을 좀 처치해주게. 일꾼들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이 무서워서 도저히 일을 할 수 없다는 구만.
20030436.English_Text: Destroy some <textColor=[110:216:175:255]><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion</> of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Mistshade Forest</>. textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome</>I can't work because I'm afraid.
20030436.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 그늘 숲</>의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>들을 좀 처치해주게. 일꾼들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이 무서워서 도저히 일을 할 수 없다는 구만.

20030437.English_Text: (It seems to be understandable to some extent)

20030438.Original_Text: 내가 직접 나서려고 했는데, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>내 모습을 한 환영</>도 있다지 뭔가. 영 꺼림칙해서 말이야.
20030438.English_Text: I was going to do it myself, but there is also a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion in my form</> or something.
20030438.Chinese_Text: 내가 직접 나서려고 했는데, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>내 모습을 한 환영</>도 있다지 뭔가. 영 꺼림칙해서 말이야.

20030440.English_Text: Thank you. My case works great.

20030441.Original_Text: 자네 덕분에 통행로의 안전이 어느정도 확보되었구만. 하하. 고맙네.
20030441.English_Text: Thanks to you, the passageway is somewhat safe. Haha. Thank you.
20030441.Chinese_Text: 자네 덕분에 통행로의 안전이 어느정도 확보되었구만. 하하. 고맙네.

20030443.Original_Text: 별 일이 아니긴. 자 여기 내가 준비한 물건일세.
20030443.English_Text: It's not a big deal. Here are the things I prepared for you.
20030443.Chinese_Text: 별 일이 아니긴. 자 여기 내가 준비한 물건일세.

20030445.Original_Text: 다음에 또 부탁할 일이 있으면 자네를 찾겠네!
20030445.English_Text: I'll look for you next time I have another request!
20030445.Chinese_Text: 다음에 또 부탁할 일이 있으면 자네를 찾겠네!

20030448.Original_Text: 우리는 약초를 캐러왔다냥. 그런데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>무서운 친구들</>이 너무 많다냥. 우리 약초꾼들을 조금만 도와달라냥.
20030448.English_Text: We're here to dig up herbs. But there are too many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scary friends</> around. Help our herbalists a little.
20030448.Chinese_Text: 우리는 약초를 캐러왔다냥. 그런데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>무서운 친구들</>이 너무 많다냥. 우리 약초꾼들을 조금만 도와달라냥.

20030451.Original_Text: 마침 잘 만났다냥! 그 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>재수 없는 은발 머리</>는 어디 갔냥?
20030451.English_Text: Looks like we met! Where did that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>unlucky silver hair</> go?
20030451.Chinese_Text: 마침 잘 만났다냥! 그 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>재수 없는 은발 머리</>는 어디 갔냥?

20030452.English_Text: (They say they've been away for a while)

20030453.Original_Text: 흥. 그래도 말이 통하는 인간이 와서 다행이다냥.
20030453.English_Text: Heh. I'm glad there's a human who can speak.
20030453.Chinese_Text: 흥. 그래도 말이 통하는 인간이 와서 다행이다냥.

20030455.Original_Text: 앗. 어떻게 알았냥!? 여기 어딘가에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 있다고 한다냥. 그것 좀 구해달라냥. 이렇게 부탁한다냥.
20030455.English_Text: Ah. How did you know!? It's like there's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gaestrogenus</> somewhere here. I want you to get it. I'm begging you like this.
20030455.Chinese_Text: 앗. 어떻게 알았냥!? 여기 어딘가에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 있다고 한다냥. 그것 좀 구해달라냥. 이렇게 부탁한다냥.

20030459.English_Text: Why do you like that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>grass</> so much?

20030466.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>의 자연이 절경이고 장관이라해서 왔는데, 이게 무슨 일인지 모르겠소!
20030466.English_Text: I came here because the nature of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> is superb and spectacular, but I don't know what this is!
20030466.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>의 자연이 절경이고 장관이라해서 왔는데, 이게 무슨 일인지 모르겠소!

20030468.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투엽단</> 놈들을 걱정했건만, 웬 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>부패한 수양 무리</>가 밀렵을 시작했소. 이를 어쩐단 말이오! 소협의 도움이 필요하오.
20030468.English_Text: I was worried about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Fighters</>, but some <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Corrupt Sheep</> were poached. I've started.
20030468.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투엽단</> 놈들을 걱정했건만, 웬 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>부패한 수양 무리</>가 밀렵을 시작했소. 이를 어쩐단 말이오! 소협의 도움이 필요하오.

20030471.Original_Text: 오, 수고했소. 덕분에 마음이 조금은 놓이는구려.
20030471.English_Text: Oh, you did a good job. I hope this puts my mind at ease a bit.
20030471.Chinese_Text: 오, 수고했소. 덕분에 마음이 조금은 놓이는구려.

20030473.Original_Text: 뿌리 뽑진 못하겠지만, 우선 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양 대장</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>회수한 밀렵품</>을 전달해보겠소. 그럼 다음에 또 뵙겠소.
20030473.English_Text: It won't be rooted out, but first, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Farm Captain</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Recovered poach</> I'll pass it on to you. See you next time.
20030473.Chinese_Text: 뿌리 뽑진 못하겠지만, 우선 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양 대장</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>회수한 밀렵품</>을 전달해보겠소. 그럼 다음에 또 뵙겠소.

20030475.Original_Text: 오, 여기서 또 만나는 군! 여긴 어쩐 일이야?
20030475.English_Text: Oh, see you here again! What's going on here?
20030475.Chinese_Text: 오, 여기서 또 만나는 군! 여긴 어쩐 일이야?

20030477.Original_Text: 그렇군. 나는 우리, 아, 아니, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</> 문주님이 보내서 왔어.
20030477.English_Text: That's right. I'm from our, ah, no, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> Lord Moon.
20030477.Chinese_Text: 그렇군. 나는 우리, 아, 아니, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</> 문주님이 보내서 왔어.

20030478.Original_Text: 그래서 말인데 나 좀 도와줄 수 있어? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</>이 요구한 일정이 너무 빠듯해서 말이야...
20030478.English_Text: So, can you help me? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</>The schedule requested by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> is too tight...
20030478.Chinese_Text: 그래서 말인데 나 좀 도와줄 수 있어? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</>이 요구한 일정이 너무 빠듯해서 말이야...

20030480.Original_Text: 오 고맙군. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낙원족이 사용하는 물건</>들 좀 구해줘. 그들이 물건도 연구 가치가 있다나...
20030480.English_Text: Oh thank you. So get me some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Paradise-use objects</>. They're also worth researching...
20030480.Chinese_Text: 오 고맙군. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낙원족이 사용하는 물건</>들 좀 구해줘. 그들이 물건도 연구 가치가 있다나...

20030482.Original_Text: 아니긴 뭐가 아니야. 이번엔 좀 직접 하라니까.
20030482.English_Text: No, it's not what it is. This time, you have to do it yourself.
20030482.Chinese_Text: 아니긴 뭐가 아니야. 이번엔 좀 직접 하라니까.

20030483.Original_Text: 에휴. 그냥 내가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>에게 부탁하는 게 낫겠다. 그렇지?
20030483.English_Text: Ugh. I'd rather just ask <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, right?
20030483.Chinese_Text: 에휴. 그냥 내가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>에게 부탁하는 게 낫겠다. 그렇지?

20030485.Original_Text: 원래는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>강철주먹</>이 할 일이었는데. 안되겠어. 확실한 사람한테 부탁을 해야지. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은 진흙지대</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여러 가지 재료</>를 구해줘.
20030485.English_Text: It was originally supposed to be <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steelfist</>. I can't. I'll have to ask someone for sure. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Get</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Various materials</> from Black Mud
20030485.Chinese_Text: 원래는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>강철주먹</>이 할 일이었는데. 안되겠어. 확실한 사람한테 부탁을 해야지. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은 진흙지대</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여러 가지 재료</>를 구해줘.

20030487.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>악어 가죽, 거북이 껍질, 질긴 거미줄</>? 이정도면 간단하지?
20030487.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Crocodile skin, tortoise skin, tough cobweb</>? Simple enough, isn't it?
20030487.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>악어 가죽, 거북이 껍질, 질긴 거미줄</>? 이정도면 간단하지?

20030489.English_Text: Then I'll be waiting for you.

20030490.Original_Text: 오! 소협. 여기서 또 보는 구만. 여기는 어쩐 일인가.
20030490.English_Text: Oh! Sohyeok. See you here again. What's going on here?
20030490.Chinese_Text: 오! 소협. 여기서 또 보는 구만. 여기는 어쩐 일인가.

20030491.English_Text: (Greetings greetings and giving you the latest news)

20030492.Original_Text: 음 그랬구만. 마침 잘됐네. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</>를 준비해야 하는데 일손이 부족해서 말이야. 자네 손을 좀 빌릴까 하는데. 하하. 이거 원 볼때마다 부탁만 하는구만.
20030492.English_Text: Well, that's right. It worked out. I need to prepare <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sunrise</>, but I'm short on staff. I'm thinking of borrowing your hand. Haha . Every time I see this, I just ask for a favor.
20030492.Chinese_Text: 음 그랬구만. 마침 잘됐네. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</>를 준비해야 하는데 일손이 부족해서 말이야. 자네 손을 좀 빌릴까 하는데. 하하. 이거 원 볼때마다 부탁만 하는구만.

20030494.Original_Text: 그럼 사양않고 부탁하겠네. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해맞이 비탈</>에서 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>묘면족</>의 동태를 좀 살펴주게.
20030494.English_Text: Then I'll ask you without hesitation. Dynamics of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</> in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunrise Slope</> Let me take a look.
20030494.Chinese_Text: 그럼 사양않고 부탁하겠네. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해맞이 비탈</>에서 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>묘면족</>의 동태를 좀 살펴주게.

20030495.Original_Text: 오 자네 왔군. 부탁이 하나 더 있네.
20030495.English_Text: Oh, you're here. I have one more request.
20030495.Chinese_Text: 오 자네 왔군. 부탁이 하나 더 있네.

20030497.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</>에서 날릴 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발발이 잎</>을 구해야는데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>시귀</>들이 너무 많네. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>시귀</>를 좀 퇴치해주면 나머지는 우리가 하겠네.
20030497.English_Text: I need to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sunrise</> for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Popbal leaves</>, but there are around <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>There are too many verses</>. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Get rid of some verses</> and we'll do the rest.
20030497.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</>에서 날릴 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발발이 잎</>을 구해야는데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>시귀</>들이 너무 많네. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>시귀</>를 좀 퇴치해주면 나머지는 우리가 하겠네.

20030500.English_Text: It's been a while since I've seen you. How have you been?

20030502.Original_Text: 음, 그러셨군요. 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</>는 소협 덕분에 안정을 찾아가고 있습니다.
20030502.English_Text: Well, you see. Our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> is finding stability thanks to the small cooperation.
20030502.Chinese_Text: 음, 그러셨군요. 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</>는 소협 덕분에 안정을 찾아가고 있습니다.

20030504.Original_Text: 흠... 소협을 이렇게 만난김에 민망하게도 신세를 한 번 더 질까 합니다. 괜찮겠습니까.
20030504.English_Text: Hmm... I'm embarrassed to have met Sohyeop like this, and I'm afraid I'll be taken care of again. Are you okay?
20030504.Chinese_Text: 흠... 소협을 이렇게 만난김에 민망하게도 신세를 한 번 더 질까 합니다. 괜찮겠습니까.

20030505.English_Text: (Anything of Oreum is said to be fine)

20030506.Original_Text: 하하, 그렇게 말씀해주시니 한결 마음이 편해지는군요. 그럼 편히 말씀 드리겠습니다.
20030506.English_Text: Haha, it makes me feel much more comfortable when you say that. Then I'll tell you more comfortably.
20030506.Chinese_Text: 하하, 그렇게 말씀해주시니 한결 마음이 편해지는군요. 그럼 편히 말씀 드리겠습니다.

20030507.Original_Text: 다른게 아니라 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 신수를 섬기는 문파를 습격하고있습니다. 당연하게도 저희 에레다도 그 대상입니다.
20030507.English_Text: Nothing else, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> is attacking the sect that worships the divine beast. Of course, our Ereda is also the target.
20030507.Chinese_Text: 다른게 아니라 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 신수를 섬기는 문파를 습격하고있습니다. 당연하게도 저희 에레다도 그 대상입니다.

20030508.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>물안개 고원</>에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>그들의 병력</> 일부가 있다고 하여 그들을 격퇴하러 왔습니다. 소협이 힘을 보태주신다면 천군만마일 것입니다.
